name: GymBro
description: GymBro is a browser based workout generator that allows you to pick certain criteria such as legs, arms, chest, etc, to generate a workout. Other selectors include workout intensity. In addition to providing you with a great workout we have also provided the user with the option to choose a music playlist to accompany the workout, using Spotify. Users can even save their last workout to LocalStorage and recall it as long keep their browser open!

name: The Cold West
description: The Cold West is a web app that allows the user to get detailed information on ten of Washington's ski resorts and some activities they have. There is an option to create an account that will allow the user to save a favorite resort and activity. By saving a favorite, that will move quick access links to the user's dashboard for more direct access to the info page in the app as well as the resort's own home page.

name: The Pantry
description: A free web app, utilizing React, designed to help small bakeries keep track of inventory and revenue.

name: The Pantry Api
description: MySQL database api to handle the needs of The Pantry web app. The Pantry is a web app aimed to help small-scale bakeries with business and inventory management.

name: User Directory
description: Pull a list of 200 random 'people' with data from an api, storing that data in state. Allowing the user to search through the names with partial matches, also allows the user to sort by first name, last name, and age by clicking on the corresponding heading.
